cmp: 子 (11 p.m.-1 a.m./1st earthly branch/child/midnight/son/child/seed/egg/small thing, (noun suff.))
mng: thick, deep or profound, kind, generous, rich or strong in flavor, to favor, to stress

exm.mng: blessed by heaven (idiom), enjoying exceptional advantages, favored by nature
dense, thick (fog, clouds etc), to have a strong interest in, deep, fully saturated (color)
tolerant, generous, magnanimous, thick and broad (build), thick and deep (voice)
mellow and rich, simple and kind
see 未可厚非[wei4 ke3 hou4 fei1]
thick, heavy, thickset (body), massive, generous, extravagant, profound, dignified
